page.title: 15SOME OF OUR HOUSES
page.content: "My house is a{council house}at Hillside.It has three bedrooms up stairs and a bathroom too.There is a kitchen where we eat and a sitting room.The back garden is small and fenced but the front is bigger and open with flower beds on each side." "My house is quite old it is made of {stone}and has sixteen windows.Outside there is a stable and tackroom with a slate roof.The garden is big with a swing.It was once a doctor's house." "I live in a{police house}because my dad is the sergeant.It is made of stone with three bedrooms,and a bathroom.It is part of the Police Station and magistrates court." "I live in a semi-detached{council {house}at Fairshaw Crescent with three bedrooms a big sitting room,kitchen and bathroom.There are gardens back and front and pebble dashed walls."
